ai-iti61:1.1_0: For this was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
ai-iti61:2.3_0: the eye of the flesh, the eye of clairvoyance, and the eye of wisdom.
ai-iti61:3.1_0: “The eye of flesh, the clairvoyant eye,
ai-iti61:3.4_0: were taught by the supreme person.
ai-iti61:4.1_0: The arising of the eye of flesh
ai-iti61:4.2_0: is the path to the clairvoyant eye.
ai-iti61:5.1_0: That’s what the Buddha has heard.
